website_summaries.verdict: Get salon-quality manicures at home for an affordable price with this well-made drill that comes with multiple accessories.
pros: Although inexpensive, this electric nail drill comes well-stocked with features including 6 drill bits and 30 sanding bands
Drill is compact and easy to operate and transport
cons: A few drills arrived with missing pieces
Not as powerful as some pricier models

customer_reviews.title: Recommended this product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a new hand and I found it super easy to use. Delivery fast also. Uploaded 2 movies for buyers, I used Bullet Drill to remove my old nail gel first, then use Small Barrel to work on my nail surface, both on a slow speed only. U can see my nail after I am done. USB cord. I highly recommended this product. Have fun all.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: back up drill when I expensive one went out and had to be sent in
customer_reviews.text: I bought to have as a spare at work it works for removing gel polish and acrylic, its great and effective more as a at home use. it Is made of metal, very comfortable to hold and easy to use. But it not include a usb adapter, just a usb cable, i have been using it with my phone charger or plugs into my laptop directly. i have used it almost a month, like it for far so I don’t have to bring my bigger drill back and forth. It does it’s job. Not professional use maybe for a starter or like I said a backup
customer_reviews.author: Miguel & Rosalinda  Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: STRONG Nail File
customer_reviews.text: All items arrived on time, and no items were missing from package. Contents were securely packed. Instruction manual was easy to understand, and easy to set up and use this nail file. The attachments were super easy to use and change, and the sander band attachment works great. Well worth the money. CAUTION: The motor on the unit is quite strong, so take care while using this. It will file your nails VERY QUICKLY. Children should probably not operate this unit; it seems to be intended for adult use.
customer_reviews.author: marcus venable

customer_reviews.title: You Will Not Be Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have attempted to do my own nails and I love that the drill made the process easy. It is super quiet and it has different speeds. It doesn’t cause any pain from the vibration. It only took 10 minutes to remove the gel from one hand. Since covid-19 I been contemplating about doing my own nails and decided to order the drill. So glad I picked this one, you will not be disappointed. It even provides a manual explaining the functions for each drill bit, which was what I needed, so I didn’t have to use all the bits to figure out which one removes the gel.
customer_reviews.author: Lanika Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Short in my cable
customer_reviews.text: I waited three weeks to get this and when it did arrive, there was a short in either the unit itself or the cable. Either way, I was very frustrated and emailed them...still haven't gotten a response back, but will change my review once things are made right. I'm also a beginner and I did not think this was as powerful as I was hoping it would be. You definitely get what you pay for and I wish I'd spent a little extra for a better nail drill. *Update* They DID get back to me and refunded my money and replaced the drill, so I'm very satisfied with the customer support and for making it right.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fewell

customer_reviews.title: Great Efile for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this little drill. It's easy to use and my nails came out gorgeous. I received my package a day sooner than expected and it works well. It was a Mother's Day present to myself.....happy with my choice thus far.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen Mami

customer_reviews.title: Great little file!
customer_reviews.text: I have at least two other inexpensive electric nail files that are pretty worthless. I wasn't really looking for another but happened to see this one and it caught my eye. The reviews were good, the price was good and the description said it was returnable. It took a bit longer to get here but it was well worth the wait. I do my own gel polish and this nail file is an absolutely wonderful addition to the process! The only thing I wish is that the on/off switch was on the unit itself instead of the cord. For me, that is the only thing that would make it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cultureduo

customer_reviews.title: Free nails for mom
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just graduated six months early and she wants to go to cosmetology school. She’s been doing her sisters nails, and her own, and does a pretty good job. Im getting her acrylic stuff for Christmas to practice on and know she will need one of these too! Love all the attachments!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I started using the drill and 1 minute into it the inner grip starting jumping in and out of the base making it impossible to do a delicate work. Extremely noisy. The switch on the wire is difficult to use. I am returning the drill - not happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this Nail set. It make my quarantine days easy and happier. Every where is closed. Even it's open but is it safe? During those crazy days. I got this cute nail set. It's so easy for the beginner user. Of cause I watched a few videos before I actually to use it. And this staff help me to save my money. Save time and money also safe! This comes with a nail clipper and all different sizes to fit my nails. There's USB cable so it's easy to connect to any adapter or laptop. The sander band attachment works good. Anyway, the price is worth for everything. It's highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT CHOICE. I've been purchasing professional equipment for my 9 year old. My friend who is a nail tech is training her and I'm impressed with the easy comprehension of this product. Great for beginners and seasoned nail techs! Great power but not painfully strong. She did my pedi last night and I'm extremely happy with the results. Oh and cost effective. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: My  DIY travel backup...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great DIY option during the pandemic. It arrived quickly, packaged well and great quality. It's not too awkward or heavy and the bits fit securely in the chamber. I wish the controls were on the grill instead of the cord. It's not super powerful, but it gets the job done. With that said, this drill does not offer a locking device for bits. Insert your bit and it remains tight and doesn't wobble. You can adjust the length without movement. Treat yourself and purchase an additional, upgraded bit package from Amazon. Your standard kit is included. Perfect for DIY, beginners, repairs or saving money while salons are closed.
customer_reviews.author: secrets

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners- frustrating if you’re intermediate or pro
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING for beginners and very affordable! If you’re just starting this is super nice. If you’re more advanced, there is not enough strength in the motor. It does that thing where it will catch on your nail and simply stop spinning because there’s not enough force used to spin it, and that’s on the highest setting too. I even tried using some other drill bits I have and same thing, catching on minimal pressure. The sanding bits seem to come in two different grits but I didn’t see any labels as to what is what and they were mixed in the same bag. Also the drill bits it comes with are pretty standard.
customer_reviews.author: khawla

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DRILL!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I was a bit skeptical when I purchased this drill. I must say say IT REALLY WORKS!!! I am now able to do my own nails and resist the salons. It does everything it says it does. It removes cuticles, buffs, smooth nail bed. It is just a wonderful mani/pedi at home for cost savings. I love that fact that it is not hard on the nails leaving them to burn. It is very comfortable and gets the job done. I LOVE THIS DRILL!
customer_reviews.author: Ciji

customer_reviews.title: Great between manicures/pedicures
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I don't schedule my mani/pedis regularly. This is perfect to get get the gel off and to buff it out between sessions. I'm not a fan of acetone and I think this is much quicker. I like seeing the progress I'm making. A huge plus - it doesn't get hot and out hasn't damaged my nails. Very easy to use and maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: M Jamison

customer_reviews.title: It worked then it broke.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: I originally rated this drill 1 star but after the provider contacted me about my less than stellar review and immediately refunded for the faulty drill I decided to give them 4 stars. While I was able to do do my nails twice before it died on me ( I'm not sure what happened but there was a clanging sound coming from inside the drill and it wouldn't rotate if i pressed it to my nail ) I do not recommend buying this drill. I don't think it can handle the strain of doing a full acrylic set. It would probably be amazing for maintaining natural nails but it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tashi Ray

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad. I really hate that the power buttons are all on a separate block of the cord... and it’s far. It’s such a pain to keep switching hands to change the different settings. The nail cutter that came with it wasn’t good. Had to push down a couple times for the nail to break acrylics/gel. Had to use a regular nail cutter instead. It comes with a variety of heads and a bag of sandpaper tops. It has different power settings. From very little, to very powerful. What you get is good for the price you pay. Only comes with USB so make sure you have a power cube before hand.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I already had this style nail drill which does just fine. I got this one to replace my old one. The reason i got this one was because of the color! Yes lol! I wanted it to match with my equipment. I love the pink line in the middle with the grey. It works just as good. Mostly used for acrylic nails. Has different speeds. I love that it came with a nail clipper thats also pink and extra bits which are good to have. Its compact and easy to travel with. Very affordable. I love these style nail drill!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette.W

customer_reviews.title: It failed in a month <10 uses
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It gets the job done, but the placement of the on/off switch should have been better thought out. It should have been on the efile itself rather than the plug imo. Update: I’ve had the e-file now a little over a month, used less than 10 times, and now the inner chamber is coming out and does not hold my e-file drills in place. I can not safely use it because it will cut my skin or my family members skin because the drill bit won’t stay in place. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Shenelle

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you apply it to a nail, there is not enough power to keep it spinning and working. It's way to weak.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C Bencivenga

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: best drill yet! The drill itself has a very nice design. Its a little smaller than I thought but its perfect since I have small hands! Its about the size of a pen but thicker. There is a switch for the direction it spins and a setting for speed but the lowest speed is fine, any faster you might take off your finger😂 The drill bits are great too too, the booklet doesn't give a precise description for the uses thougg so i suggest you look it up. And there are actually two different types of sanding paper used for the sanding bit. I just with the cord was a bit longer but that's ok
customer_reviews.author: Abeer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: As a former nail tech, I'd say this portable nail drill is perfect for personal usage. It is easy to handle and the attachments fit securely. The device is small enough to fit in your makeup bag while being powerful enough to shape your acrylic nails without much effort on your part. I've used it on acrylic nails, dipping powder, and even natural nails. I love my device and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KKelley52

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like this nail drill a lot! First of all, it’s amazing that it has the usb charging cord. It’s definitely not heavy or too light! I believe it has a decent weight that make it easy to use. I absolutely loved the idea that it has 30 sanding bands in the pack. I tried all the bits and now I’m definitely switching to taking the gel polish off with this nail drill. It makes it easy to adjust the power and the direction right on the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Cute and powerful little drill
customer_reviews.text: I think this drill is a good investment for new people like myself. It was very user-friendly nice and sleek small enough for smaller fingers. It is very powerful and does what it is supposed to do an I was able to take the powder nails off and was able to apply a new set to my nails almost as good as the professionals. The thing that I noted bad was the cord was a little short. and it was a little hard to take out the drill bit. but otherwise, I say this is a great starter drill and it is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Siby MOM

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do my own dip powder nails when the salons closed for COVID. It worked just fine for what I needed - the bits are nice variety, does the job. However after four uses the metal part that the drill bit heads attach to starts spinning loose and has to pushed back into place, then comes loose again intermittently. It’s still usable but I’m sad it’s already busted with even minor use. Unfortunately I’m past my return date or I would send it back. If you’re wanting this for more than personal use I would pick a better quality more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyO89

customer_reviews.title: Great nail drill for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I used to do my nails years ago, but I am NOT licensed. I never thought I would need to or want to do my nails at home. I purchased this little drill, very easy to hold, nice package, and extras. Used once so far to remove grown out acrylics. Sanding bands great, easy to hold, very quiet! You need a USB power pack to use this portable. I thought it was rechargeable... no problem, have a small battery I use to charge my phone and this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sunbodie

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner nail techs
customer_reviews.text: Its great for beginners, but it stops working in the middle of using. I have to readjust the cord for it to turn back on. Its awkward having to use it from a certain angle just for it to turn on, but it gets the job done. A good go to for beginners or traveling nail techs! You can always adjust how slow or fast you’d like for it to be & the clippers work very well. update: The company was very professional and emailed me about sending me a new cord, so everything will be working fine. They have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: My personal review
customer_reviews.text: at first I was scared but I was like forget it and went for it... it’s a wonderful drill and fits all my other drill bits, it has changing speeds which is awesome.. best decision I’ve made and well worth the money so far! If you feeling some type of way and Come across my review this is me telling you to get it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alaysia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners and on the go.
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute and perfect for beginners. It doesn’t have the bulky machine attached to it, you only need to connect to a USB port. You can adjust the strength and adjust back and forth. It comes with all essential drills and a bunch of heads to last you awhile. It’s super light weight which I love! I rated it 4 stars because it’s obviously not the professional kind but it is still very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: this nail drill is so cute! i love the color & the cord is long enough.. the only thing i didnt like about it was that the controls arent on the nail drill itself, in order to increase/decrease speed, u need to use the control on the cord. that was a bit inconvenient & i will most likely get another drill where i can easily change the speed & direction. overall this is a great nail drill, very beginner friendly ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Ti

customer_reviews.title: The perfect nail drill
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I have been looking for a lightweight, durable nail drill for a while because I do my nails at home. I love this one. It was a very good price and it came with lots of different heads! This is perfect for any one who does their nails at home!
customer_reviews.author: OCmom

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern design with high quality output!
customer_reviews.text: Great nail drill and filling kit. Bought this for my wife. She really liked the sleek design and pink ascents. She loved a ton of attachments for all different needs. She has tried most of them and really impressed about the output. She asked me to write an awesome review and she is very happy with the product. She is not usually this motivated about reviews, I’m sure she liked it a lot. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Praneet Raj

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't work, I plugged it into every outlet and device I own, it has no power. Unfortunately, I'll have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine at first... after one month, broke!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first, did what it said it would however completely stopped working after about a month of using it. It also would get pretty hot if you used it for more than 5 minutes. Its pretty annoying considering I paid almost 40 for it, i came here to leave the review and now it shows 23. Its definitely not worth the price, the nail clipper was nice but as for the actual drill, it just didn't have a good life span. Now I know not to buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Verified_amazonian💕

customer_reviews.title: scary at first but easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, was expecting a slower motor but it is amazing! I’m just now beginning to do gel extensions at home and got tired of manually filing so I got this and it is daunting to use at first so take it easy and practice on yourself, did my first set on a relative and we were both satisfied with the results! compact for me and love the nail clipper included! buy now if you’re looking for one of these bad bois
customer_reviews.author: Hercilia Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good drill, esp for the price. It has a nice weight to it and the attachments go on very secure. I also like the variety of the attachment files that came with it. Save your money on more expensive drills because this one feels just as professional and high end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong , gets the job done .
customer_reviews.text: Strong and easy to use , did good job , kinda of impressed with it .
customer_reviews.author: Prue_love

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The drill is very easy to use and easy to hold. The lower setting is great for natural nails and acrylic overlay. Anything higher would be better for full acrylic nails. It comes with enough drill bits for finger nails and toes. The only thing I didn't like was the Acrylic Fake Nail Clipper. It is not strong enough for thick acrylic nails. And not wide enough to get the nail in there. Wide enough for a dipped nail that's been dipped 3 times or less.
customer_reviews.author: CATRIECE BERRY

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This took me a few tries to get the hang of it but it's overall a good product. It's not as powerful as I'd like but it does the job on natural nails. It works OK on polygel so I'm not sure it it would do too well on acrylic. UPDATE: The drill broke after having it for a month and using it on polygel. I used it no more than 10 times but more than 5.
customer_reviews.author: user1987

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought this drill. It's perfect, easy to use, the forward and reverse setting is amazing. It's so easy to use I can use it right or left handed doing my own nails. Low vibration which is great for my arthritis, doesn't heat up, speed control is wonderful. I compared so many drills before deciding on this one and I couldn't be happier. And all the attachments are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I LOVE IT! Before and after pics included!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bulky, but has a little weight to it, so it’s durable. Because of a chronic illness I have HORRIBLE brittle natural nails and it’s embarrassing. I’ve been going to the salon for the past few years, but all the salons were closed because of covid. I used this and the Kiss acrylic nail dip kit and am very pleased with the results. Only my second time doing this and I’m already getting pretty good at it lol. Yay! No more wasted $ at the nail salon.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey253

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, good quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great drill and very light weight. I love that it rotates in both directions and that there is speed control! I'm not a professional so I'm glad I have control. I feel confident that I'm not going to hurt my nails. All the stuff that came with it was a plus as well! Great quality, great price. I have used for 2-3mo now and no issues. When and if it dies I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron

customer_reviews.title: Stuck at home with 10 nails lifting...great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Only thing that changed my mind for 5 stars was I did not get the sanding bit so sanders were useless, had to make use of it with the other bits which weren't to bad, but wanted that tool. Had to spend more money and purchase the bit I needed. Other than that, easy to handle and much better than a regular file.
customer_reviews.author: Sha6... NY

customer_reviews.title: Home Manicure Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: If you have started doing your own gel nails at home due to Covid (or just to save money), you must get an electric nail drill! I love how easy this one is to use. It's not to bulky so it fits in my hand well and is easy to control. This one also came with a variety of bits and accessories, which I really appreciated! I definitely recommend this nail drill!!
customer_reviews.author: Liza M. Guerra-Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Why Didn't I Try It Sooner
customer_reviews.text: This nail drill is easy to use and reduces filing time drastically. Makes DIY nails look professional. The drill has several attachments and the speed can be adjusted. I've tried manual files and this electric one is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I started doing my nails at home. This worked so well for filing. I like how easy the handle is to hold and the pieces that came with it. My nails look great!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and gets the job done. I have never done my nails with gelx but decided to try it during quarantine. This was the perfect option for me; its very simple, starter machine with drill bit options. If you’re advance you may want to invest in nicer drill bits or a machine that provides more options for control.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I’ve used a drill and let me say this one was so easy and light to use . Took me a few mins to get the hang of it .I started with my non dominant hand & wow super easy ,just what I needed . I recently also just started learning how todo my own acrylic so this lil drill is super handy yet powerful , I love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: NATAZHA Baez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just received my drill and nail cutter and it works beautifully. It is very easy to use and to hold and the power is great. I just shaved off uv gel polish and it came off smoothly. I definitely recommend for beginners and for the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Effie C

customer_reviews.title: Great nail drill at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing my nails at home myself and this Electric nail drill has been a game changer. Light weight fits perfectly in your hand perfect length electrical cord. And comes with everything you will need. I file the tips of my nails before putting them on so they have a better hold before applying glue and this nail drill gets the job done perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: not a good product to last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this provide not even 2 months, only have used it for 2 nail applications (which I did like the drill, it wasn’t as professional as a nail Salon but it did the job) and I already have to buy a new drill. This product did not come with warranty so I can’t get this fixed/replaced NOR can I get a refund now because the return window closed June 4th lol . I’m very disappointed with this device and highly upset at how quick that it have out. Hopefully they end up offering warranty at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grinder
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is so powerful. Be careful if you are just beginning it will grind away your fingernails very quickly. Grinder has a nice speed adjuster but even the slowest speed is still fast
customer_reviews.author: Juan and mindy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product shipped very fast and came packaged with everything described. The instructions are very clear and it is easy to use. The nail clippers describe exactly how to cut the nails. And the sanders work very well. I bought this to use like a dremel tool on making tumblers and it works well for sanding epoxy off of spots that aren’t meant to have epoxy on them as well as for nails. I can see that I will use this for other projects as well. This is a very good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: easy grip Not too light or heavy Can increase speed while using Many different connections to choose Comes with directions on which bits to use
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.NolaJAE

customer_reviews.title: Works on rough patched feet also.
customer_reviews.text: I first used this on my husbands feet and it worked perfectly. Didnt over heat and was easy to control . i really needed one cause i keep my nails longer . so this comes in handy
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: Great electric file to make things easier.
customer_reviews.text: I do my own poly gel nails and have been looking for a nail file and decided on this one. It was a very good choice and it works well without being super expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is just like what they use in the nail salons. It has slower and faster settings. It was the last thing I needed to complete my at home nail salon. I have been DIY my nails since Covid. I love this thing. Comes with replacement file heads. It’s been great. I really like it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: alexa h markiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Vendor replaced at no charge
customer_reviews.text: The first unit stopped working after three uses. Eventually the seller got in touch and offered to replace at no charge. I will update my review once I have the chance to establish that the original problem was isolated.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product, and I would have given it 5 stars however, after just over 90 days the nail drill broke. It makes a horrible grinding noise when turned on and the speed will not change. I reached out to the seller to see if they had any type of warranty but 5 days later I still have not heard from them, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it’s been used
customer_reviews.text: This came with some of the piece “loose” and I wrapped. It could be possible that the drill bits and the clippers slipped free of packaging during shipping HOWEVER the box containing the bits and the bag with the file attachments are securely closed. Not sure given the environment of health right that I’ll be using this. Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun to use! Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when buying it I thought if I don’t like it I can just return. It came at the right time. Because we couldn’t go to salons we learned how to do it our selves and have good time. It is easy to use since they comes with instructions on how it works. My girls found it easy use or “play” with. I would recommend it if you want to have a mommy-daughter fun time.
customer_reviews.author: HOUSNA H

customer_reviews.title: Drill malfunction
customer_reviews.text: The drill worked fine for 1 or 2 weeks then it started to make a noise.... the part where you insert your drill bit starts to come loose it begins to Rattle up against the actual nail drill bit piece when the drill is on.. I'm going to see if I can exchange this drill for another one and then I'll update my review Edit: the company reached out And went above and beyond to make a customer happy.. Awsome job
customer_reviews.author: ashley furm

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: This little tool does really riched my life, Since the Covid19, I have not been stepped out of my home for 3 weeks. I have to learn to do nails at home by myself. This little e-file is so helpful and has excellent quality. It fills like I’m a real nail tech, Now, I will cancel all my nail appointments, and do my own nails at home. So glad I bought it. nice one
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: This item has been used and is being sold as new.
customer_reviews.author: Earnestine Sims

customer_reviews.title: Received two defective drills same issues with both waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The first one cane damaged and I returned it. Got a replacement. Haven’t had a chance to use it. Tried to use it yesturday for the first time and that one is damaged and defective doing the same thing and I can’t even process a warranty replacement. Wish I never bought it now I need to replace it yet again. Don’t think I will ever but another of these looking for a good product before I purchase again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole desjardins

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this thing is amazing I just started doing my own nails and I didnt want to spend a ton on an expensive drill. I thought this will do till I save up for a better one, but now there's no need. This one is all ill ever need. I use it ALL the time with no issues. Its quieter than expected too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Snip snip
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight making maneuvering around your fingers easier. Very easy to use with extra adapters. Feels like it’s molded in your palm. Low vibration and friction. Easily packs up for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This e-file is the best decision I’ve made. I use this in myself and my nail clients and it’s sped up time doing nails. This is painless, doesn’t give that burn feeling when you use it on your nail for extended time. If this ever broke, I would buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dixinator

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this hand drill. It made quarantine worthwhile. I was able to sand off the old gel polish and try back my nails. Get yourself one!
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Renee

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Hope I don't jinx myself but I love this drill! So far! Even tho it's not expensive & I'm only using it for myself to do my own nails it works great! I read manqy many reviews & didn't want to spend a ton & this one didn't have a single bad review for this brand & I mean they have a money back so if something happened.... Worst case return it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schulatz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sense quarantine my nails have been shot! This is amazing. Feels like a pro but works great for someone just trying to shape and maintain at home in between or even if you are a pro. I’m cosmo licensed so I have some knowledge but I do hair not nails so I was happy it was really user friendly and great quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use to be a nail tech and over the years my things have been stolen or lost. So I bought this just to brush up and see if I can still do it lol and I love it. It's powerful, easy to use and I'd say if you are a beginner this is a good tool to start with. The nail cutters are perfect as well. Feel cheap but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: MrsTorian

customer_reviews.title: Honest review!!!
customer_reviews.text: 1 The cable is short, cheap and is a SUB cable. 2 Pend is a good size but does not work wireless, nither have on and off "buttons" are all in the wire, as you can see in the photos attached. In my opinion, the cable is the dawn fall of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't good enough
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the fact that its not strong enough to remove artificial nails Doesn't work like the nail techs. I bought it so I didn't have to pay the nail salon to remove my nails but in the end I still have to pay them because this one wasn't good enough
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Best for it's price range but not the best e-file
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice weighted file. Feels solid n the torque is good. Reversible direction is very nice. However it overheats easily and can only take short runs before you gotta let it rest n cool down or you blow the motor. I found out the hard way. Also the cord to body connection is touchy. Too far plugged in n it doesn't work. You plug it in all the way n then gotta back it up a lil for it to get power
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Significant weight=good value! Easy to hold. Includes acrylic snippers.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, with good weight! I was surprised by the heavy enough feel on the weight. Seems of good quality and good value for price. Has acrylic snippets to make removal easy. Many interchangeable heads. Fast shipping. Nice color in person (pink)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew w Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to put my watching someone else do my nail skills to the test. And I wasn’t let down. I used this on my toes to give it that fresh pedicure look and it definitely does help and work. Super easy to use there’s a high and low thing on the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Tarek Ruichi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible nail clipper
customer_reviews.text: The nail clippers are not good broke in first use not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this drill all the time! Whether it be for my cuticles, removing acrylic nails, shaping my nails of removing shellac polish. It simply does the job. At first I used the slowest setting just to get used to the product, now I can use it at higher speeds and it works great. I do not use it for my own acrylic application but I do believe it would be suitable enough for that use.
customer_reviews.author: George Allport

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cool! I love it. Some people may have a problem with the way it turns off, however, I don’t mind. To turn it on you have to slide the on switch either to the left or right. To turn it off you have to slide the switch to the middle. It isn’t difficult and I can do it with one hand! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this electric nail drill because I decided to do my own nails since I cannot go to the salon due to COVID. For beginners like me it’s an amazing product, easy to use and because it’s electric, it’s powerful enough to do the job. Overall I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gamez

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool thing, everyone should have it!
customer_reviews.text: I have long dreamed of buying a nail drill! It’s especially cool now that you can’t leave the house once again! Very easy to use, you can take a trip for the future. Now my nails look as if she had just left the salon. And by the way, it takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one portable nail drill before this one, but it does not compare to the power of the YaFex nail drill. I used it with a wall adapter and it worked perfectly. I used it to prep my nails before using press ons and its definitely a necessary step to longer wear. Love it so much. Can't wait to keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Lo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: The nail drill was great and easy to use but the nail cutter broke the moment I took it out the box and squeezed the handles together....... after writing this review the company contracted me and gave me a refund for the nail cutter. I didn't expected that this really cares about their customers' experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tasheika Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work great for gel polish Small set but got everything you need to make home manicure Super easy to use I like when those small orders, small items surprised me all the time and at the end are the best products
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, strong nails and when I placed this on top of my nail to buff, it stopped spinning. The motor was still turning but the nail bit stopped turning. I was not pushing too hard as I had barely laid it on the top of my nail for the first time. The adjustability worked and I was on the highest, the forward and reverse also worked, however, when I placed this on my nail it did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice handling but it cuts off in mid-use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and precision of the drill. The only thing I didn’t like was that it keeps cutting off if I do not hold it just right. I may have a defective one but I’m not sure. No one else seems to have this problem so I’ll try reaching out to the company. Other than that it’s a good buy and quick delivery. I’d recommend this one and one other for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beginners Nail Drill
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and was neatly packaged. I was pleasantly surprised with how easy it was to set up. All you need is an adapter to use the drill which I used a typical phone adapter. You can adjust the speed with the small dial next to the on and off switch and you just insert the bits without having to unscrew and twist the drill. I like how it comes with a lot of extra sanding bits and a nail tip cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: For the price it did what I needed it for. Love they gave you plenty extra file to fit the drill.
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient enough
customer_reviews.text: It is a great nail drill for someone that is just starting out. The nail clipper is not sturdy at all and gets stuck. That could use some improvement but it comes with several extra file bits. Which is great! This is a great addition to my nail kit
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: VERY POWERFUL!! GREAT PRODUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! For the price it’s amazing!!! this Drill set is unbelievable amazing, I am a beginner & trust me you just need to put in on low it will get your nails done promise! Very strong just like in the nail salons!! I REALLY RECOMMEND THIS ELECTRIC NAIL DRILL SET!!!!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dalisay Leverett

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. comfortable. Easy to operate the only problem is only one of the little drill bits hold the replacement scrub things... the other drill bit sizes do not fit them...overall I like it just cant use everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Is super easy to hold! Totally changed the look of my dip nails. I love this product best of all of you purchase a portable usb battery pack you can use it anywhere! Awesome nail starter drill. The manual also advises which attachment to use
customer_reviews.author: Tallulah

customer_reviews.title: Not Portable must be plugged into power source use
customer_reviews.text: Read the description carefully. It is not portable the USB cord MUST be plugged into a power source in order to work. There is not an internal battery that is charged with the USB. Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: JerzShoreBear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This nail drill kit is perfect!! With COVID on the run. I have opted to start doing my own nails. The kit comes with instructions on how to use the tool itself and also which attachments to use for different things like shortening a nail or pushing back a cuticle!! Definitely great for beginners!!
customer_reviews.author: vallana

customer_reviews.title: I Now Feel Professional!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and others to start doing home care for my manicure and pedicure. I used it yesterday to file down my toe nails while completing a home pedicure. This product is easy to use and gave my toes a professional pedicured look. The directions come in several languages so the machine is easy to use even for a beginner. I can't wait to use it to do my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Richards

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Since covid-19, I’ve been trying out new things. Figuring out how to do my nails was on my list. This nail drill makes it easy to file and it smooths out my nails. It does a good job at it. For a beginner I think my nails look good!
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for fixing up my acrylic nails. Whenever they are grown out and I can’t make to nail salon I use this to file the down and make them look like my natural nails. This set comes with a great nail clipper that is perfect for acrylic nails as well. You do have to have a steady hand and not put the setting at too high of a speed otherwise it hurts the nails. But if using at medium speed with steady hand it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect set, well made. It's really easy to use and durable. After using it,I come to the conclusion that, this item is well worth the price. Comes with so many attachments for various usage! I am loving it, definitely a 5 stars for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: this common is great they gave me a refund for the drill being to fast for me the customer service was amazing thank you! The bits are hard to get out of the drill. The drill is far to fast even on the lowest setting so please be careful but it’s good for getting the hang of things I would recommend getting a drill with better speed control then this one
customer_reviews.author: Nea

product_meta.title: Electric Nail Drill- Professional Portable Manicure Pedicure E-file Kit with Acrylic Fake Nail Clipper for Shaping, Polishing, Removing Acrylic Gel Nails
feature_bullets: Upgraded USB Design & Portable Size: With standard USB design, connect this portable efile nail drill to any USB port like power bank, laptop, AC adapter, and even car charger. Use it anywhere with its compact pen size.

Powerful & Adjustable Speed / Direction: 0-20,000 RPM adjustable speed controller and direction switch design. This professional nail drill machine adjusts the speed and working directions (clockwise and counterclockwise) with switches on the USB cable. Ideal for salon and home use.

Multi-Function Acrylic Nail Drill Kit: With 6 metal drill bits, 30pcs sanding bands, and an acrylic nail tips cutter, this electric manicure/pedicure kit meets all your need of nail art. Buffering, grinding, sharpening, sanding, polishing for acrylic and gel nails, trimming thick natural toenails, and removing extension gels, cuticle and dead skin.

Upgraded Material, Comfortable Using Experience: Equipped with shock-absorbing bearing and precise motor, this nail grinder manicure kit ensures the nail drill works noiselessly and smoothly. Cooling aluminum alloy shell with ergonomic design, easy to hold and handle. Provide you a comfortable nail art experience.
For Nail Drill Maintenance: Please rest the nail drill for about 2-3 minutes after about 15 minutes working to avoid overheating.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
